pullrequest.title: Move boost libraries in pkg-config to Libs.private

content.raw:
I think we may need to fix one of the examples

~~~
371: [100%] Linking CXX executable custom_main
371: /usr/bin/ld: CMakeFiles/custom_main.dir/custom_main.cc.o: undefined reference to symbol '_ZN5boost6system15system_categoryEv'
371: //usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_system.so.1.58.0: error adding symbols: DSO missing from command line
~~~

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/1095/testReport/junit/(root)/Standalone_ExamplesBuild_Standalone/Standalone_5/
